General.Name: Anhui Genuine New Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Genuine NewMaterials Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and deals in printing and packaging materials in China and internationally. It offers cigarette sealing, anodized aluminum, cigarette tipping paper, and other decoration packaging products. The company was formerly known as Taihu Jiyou Paper Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Anhui Genuine New Materials Co.,Ltd. in March 2016. Anhui Genuine NewMaterials Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Anqing, China.

2.Name: Mr. Li Zheng  Liu
2.Title: VP, Sec. of the board & Director
